text: iPad Pro 7th generation (also known as iPad Pro 7 and iPad Pro M4) is a tablet computer developed by Apple Inc.. It was released on 15 May 2024. It has two sizes, 11-inch and 13-inch. == Features == iPad Pro 7th generation 11-inch has 12MP wide back camera, 12MP face detection, HDR selfie camera, Apple M4 chipset, 11 inch OLED 120hz screen, 10290mAh battery capacity and 8/16GB RAM. iPad Pro 7th generation 13-inch has 12MP wide back camera, 12MP face detection, HDR selfie camera, Apple M4 chipset, 13 inch OLED 120hz screen, 10290mAh battery capacity and 8/16GB RAM. == References == Category:IPad Category:Tablet computers
title: IPad Pro (7th generation)
